questions.question: What is the relationship between the Golden Section Search and Fibonacci sequence?

answers.a: There is no relationship between the two
answers.b: The Golden Section Search converges at a rate equal to the Fibonacci sequence
answers.c: The Golden Section Search is based on the Fibonacci sequence
answers.d: The Golden Section Search uses Fibonacci numbers to determine the search interval

questions.question: The interval of uncertainty is reduced by a factor of approximately _______ in each iteration of the Golden Section Search.
What is the primary objective of the Golden Section Search method?
The Golden Section Search method operates by:

answers.a: Dividing the interval into equal parts

questions.question: The Golden Section Search method is an example of a:
During the iterations of Golden Section Search, which intervals are typically considered?

answers.c: Both intervals on either side of the current best points
answers.d: Only the interval containing the current minimum value
